remarks: Value of a symbol in the left half of a concatenated word.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 30-Apr-2020.)
statement: ccatval1 $p |- ( ( S e. Word B /\ T e. Word B /\ I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` S ) ) ) -> ( ( S ++ T ) ` I ) = ( S ` I ) ) $.
